p: D.W.G.S. acknowledges support from a Marie Sk≈Çodowska-Curie Intra-European Fellowship (grant no. 796877). D.D.d.M. was supported through a Carl Trygger's scholarship (grant no. CTS17:109). N.S. was supported by the Russian Foundation of Basic Research (RFBR) through grant no. Arctic-18-05-60261. The genetic analyses were funded by Stockholm University, a grant from the Norwegian Research Council (project no. 244557/E50) and two grants from Formas (project nos 2015-676 and 2018-01640).
